About Us

Tom McGuire

An experienced QA tester and data specialist with a demonstrated history of working on mobile and web applications. I help developers get feedback quicker and give business information they need to make informed decisions. My superpower is understanding applications from both a technical and business perspective; I am able to recommend improvements that leverage existing infrastructure and help guide the production of additional features.

Anthony Turinski

I've basically been unemployed since high school so I don't have a rich history to share unlike most of my compatriots here. Codefellows might be the first time I've ever really tried to apply myself so wish me luck.
